bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of red or white dan du 丹毒 , cinnabar poison, activating protrusions, with the swelling not occupying a permanent location. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 游腫之候， 青、黃、赤、白，無復定色，遊走皮膚之間，肉上微光是也 , “The signs of roaming swelling : virid, yellow, red – it has no fixed color. It roams in the skin, and there is a mild gloss on the flesh”.
